properties.name: Needham Broughton High School

• Mascot is the Capitals

  • John Wall went here for a year

properties.name: North Carolina State University

properties.name: Ridge Road Pool

• Favorite place for people to go in the summer

properties.name: Dorothea Dix Park
properties.clues:
• Named after an activist for the rights of the mentally ill
  • 108 acres
  • Was almost sold by for development a few years ago

properties.name: Central Prison
properties.clues:
• You shouldn't try to end up here
  • Over 700 people live here
  • Is run by Wake County government
